verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they put out <S%H7971><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> every leper <S%H6879><s%>, and every one that has an issue <S%H2100><s%>, and whoever is defiled <S%H2931><s%> by the dead <S%H5315><s%>:

Both male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> shall you put out <S%H7971><s%>, outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> shall you put <S%H7971><s%> them <S%H2930><s%>; that they defile not their camps <S%H4264><s%>, in the middle <S%H8432><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> I live <S%H7931><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did so <S%H6213><s%>, and put them out <S%H7971><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>: as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, When a man <S%H376><s%> or woman <S%H802><s%> shall commit <S%H6213><s%> any sin <S%H2403><s%> that men <S%H120><s%> commit <S%H4603><s%>, to do a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and that person <S%H5315><s%> be guilty <S%H816><s%>;

Then they shall confess <S%H3034><s%> their sin <S%H2403><s%> which they have done <S%H6213><s%>: and he shall recompense <S%H7725><s%> his trespass <S%H817><s%> with the principal <S%H7218><s%> there <S%H3254><s%>, and add unto it the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part there <S%H5414><s%>, and give it unto him against whom he has trespassed <S%H816><s%>.

But if the man <S%H376><s%> have no kinsman <S%H1350><s%> to recompense <S%H7725><s%> the trespass <S%H817><s%> unto <S%H817><s%>, let the trespass be recompensed <S%H7725><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, even to the priest <S%H3548><s%>; beside the ram <S%H352><s%> of the atonement <S%H3725><s%>, by which an atonement shall be made for him <S%H3722><s%>.
And every offering <S%H8641><s%> of all the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they bring <S%H7126><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>, shall be his.
And every man <S%H376><s%>'s hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> shall be his <S%H376><s%>: whatever any man gives <S%H5414><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, it shall be his.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H376><s%>, If any man <S%H376><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> go aside <S%H7847><s%>, and commit <S%H4603><s%> a trespass against him <S%H4604><s%>,

And a man <S%H376><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> with her carnally <S%H7902><s%>, and it be hid <S%H5956><s%> from the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of her husband <S%H376><s%>, and be kept close <S%H5641><s%>, and she be defiled <S%H2930><s%>, and there be no witness <S%H5707><s%> against her <S%H8610><s%>, neither she be taken with the manner;

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> upon him <S%H7065><s%>, and he be jealous of his wife <S%H802><s%>, and she be defiled <S%H2930><s%>: or if the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> upon him <S%H7065><s%>, and he be jealous of his wife <S%H802><s%>, and she be not defiled <S%H2930><s%>:

Then shall the man <S%H376><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and he shall bring <S%H935><s%> her offering <S%H7133><s%> for her <S%H6224><s%>, the tenth part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> meal <S%H7058><s%>; he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> no oil <S%H8081><s%> upon it <S%H5414><s%>, nor put frankincense <S%H3828><s%> on it <S%H4503><s%>; for it is an offering of jealousy <S%H7068><s%>, an offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%>, bringing <S%H2142><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to memory <S%H2142><s%>.
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring her near <S%H7126><s%>, and set <S%H5975><s%> her before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>:

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in an earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>; and of the dust <S%H6083><s%> that is in the floor <S%H7172><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it into the water <S%H4325><s%>:

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall set <S%H5975><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and uncover <S%H6544><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%> in her hands <S%H3709><s%>, which is the jealousy <S%H7068><s%> offering <S%H4503><s%>: and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall have in his hand <S%H3027><s%> the bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that causes the curse <S%H779><s%>:

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall charge her by an oath <S%H7650><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%>, If no man <S%H376><s%> have lain <S%H7901><s%> with you <S%H7847><s%>, and if you have not gone aside to uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> with another instead of your husband <S%H376><s%>, be you free <S%H5352><s%> from this bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that causes the curse <S%H779><s%>:

But if you have gone aside <S%H7847><s%> to another instead of your husband <S%H376><s%>, and if you be defiled <S%H2930><s%>, and some man <S%H376><s%> have <S%H5414><s%> lain <S%H7903><s%> with you beside <S%H1107><s%> your husband <S%H376><s%>:

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall charge <S%H7650><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> with an oath <S%H7621><s%> of cursing <S%H423><s%>, and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> you a curse <S%H423><s%> and an oath <S%H7621><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%>, when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> does make <S%H5414><s%> your thigh <S%H3409><s%> to rot <S%H5307><s%>, and your belly <S%H990><s%> to swell <S%H6639><s%>;

And this water <S%H4325><s%> that causes the curse <S%H779><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> into your bowels <S%H4578><s%>, to make your belly <S%H990><s%> to swell <S%H6638><s%>, and your thigh <S%H3409><s%> to rot <S%H5307><s%>: And the woman <S%H802><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>, amen <S%H543><s%>.
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall write <S%H3789><s%> these curses <S%H423><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%>, and he shall blot <S%H4229><s%> them out with the bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>:

And he shall cause the woman <S%H802><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> the bitter <S%H4751><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that causes the curse <S%H779><s%>: and the water <S%H4325><s%> that causes the curse <S%H779><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into her <S%H4751><s%>, and become bitter.

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the jealousy <S%H7068><s%> offering <S%H4503><s%> out of the woman <S%H802><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>, and shall wave <S%H5130><s%> the offering <S%H4503><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and offer <S%H7126><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take an handful <S%H7061><s%> of the offering <S%H4503><s%>, even the memorial <S%H234><s%> there <S%H6999><s%>, and burn it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and afterward <S%H310><s%> shall cause the woman <S%H802><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%>.

And when he has made her to drink <S%H8248><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%>, then it shall come to pass <S%H2930><s%>, that, if she be defiled, and have done <S%H4603><s%> trespass <S%H4604><s%> against her husband <S%H376><s%>, that the water <S%H4325><s%> that causes the curse <S%H779><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into her <S%H4751><s%>, and become bitter, and her belly <S%H990><s%> shall swell <S%H6638><s%>, and her thigh <S%H3409><s%> shall rot <S%H5307><s%>: and the woman <S%H802><s%> shall be a curse <S%H423><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> her people <S%H5971><s%>.
And if the woman <S%H802><s%> be not defiled <S%H2930><s%>, but be clean <S%H2889><s%>; then she shall be free <S%H5352><s%>, and shall conceive <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>.
This is the law <S%H8451><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%>, when a wife <S%H802><s%> goes aside <S%H7847><s%> to another instead of her husband <S%H376><s%>, and is defiled <S%H2930><s%>;

Or when the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> comes <S%H5674><s%> upon him <S%H376><s%>, and he be jealous <S%H7065><s%> over his wife <S%H802><s%>, and shall set <S%H5975><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall execute <S%H6213><s%> upon her all this law <S%H8451><s%>.
Then shall the man <S%H376><s%> be guiltless <S%H5352><s%> from iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and this <S%H1931><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> shall carry <S%H5375><s%> her iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
